alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Oconto and northeastern Langlade Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Veterans Memorial County Park, or 10 miles northeast of Antigo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bryant, Boot Lake Campground, Freeman, Neva, Lawrence Lake Natural Area, Pickerel, Choate, Peters Marsh Wildlife Area, Hollister and Lily. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
